summary: I am a recent McMaster University Computer Science graduate looking to practice my skills in a professional environment; currently, I am working for Jarvis Consulting as a software developer. Since high school, I have always enjoy the wide range of problems that programming can let me solve, as well as the many complexed challenges that accompany working towards a well structured solution.
